## ArctangentHNode class

Computes the inverse hyperbolic tangent function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ArctangentHNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns atanh(x) = 0.5 \* ln((1 + x) / (1 - x)) for \|x\| &lt; 1 Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
